alive.desc: Check bot status and system information

antidelete.usage:
*Anti-Delete Management:*

*.antidel g* - Forward deleted messages to the same group/chat
*.antidel p* - Forward to your private chat (sudo)
*.antidel sudo* - Forward only sudo's deleted messages to sudo
*.antidel <jid>* - Forward to specific JID
*.antidel null* - Disable anti-delete

*.getantidel* - Check current settings
antidelete.updated:
‚úÖ Anti-delete forwarding updated to: *{0}*

_Deleted messages will now be automatically forwarded._
antidelete.not_set:
Anti-delete forwarding is not configured.

Use *.antidel* to configure it.

autorespond.no_api_key: ‚ùå GEMINI_API_KEY not configured. Please add it to enable auto-responder.
autorespond.already_ignored: ‚ùå This number is already in the ignore list.
autorespond.not_ignored: ‚ùå This number is not in the ignore list.
autorespond.ignore_usage:
*Ignore Usage:*

*.ar ignore add <number>* - Add number to ignore
*.ar ignore remove <number>* - Remove number
*.ar ignore list* - Show ignored numbers
*.ar ignore clear* - Clear all ignored numbers
autorespond.usage:
*Auto Responder Commands:*

*.ar status* - Show current settings
*.ar on* - Enable auto-responder
*.ar off* - Disable auto-responder
*.ar ignore* - Manage ignored numbers
*.ar personality <text>* - Set bot personality

gemini.desc: AI chat using Google Gemini with image support
gemini.Key: ‚ùå GEMINI_API_KEY not configured. Please add it to config.
gemini.example:
Please provide a query.

*Example:*
.gemini What is AI?

Or reply to an image with .gemini to analyze it.

convert.usage:
*Convert Usage:*

Reply to:
‚Ä¢ Photo ‚Üí .convert sticker
‚Ä¢ Sticker ‚Üí .convert image
‚Ä¢ Video ‚Üí .convert gif
convert.reply_media: ‚ùå Please reply to a photo, sticker, or video.

demote.desc: Demote a user from admin (group only)
demote.mention_user: ‚ùå Please mention or reply to a user to demote.
demote.not_admin: ‚ùå This user is not an admin.

promote.desc: Promote a user to admin (group only)
promote.mention_user: ‚ùå Please mention or reply to a user to promote.
promote.not_admin: ‚ùå Bot must be admin to promote users.

kick.desc: Remove a user from the group
kick.mention_user: ‚ùå Please mention or reply to a user to kick.
kick.not_admin: ‚ùå Bot must be admin to kick users.

imagen.no_query:
‚ùå Please provide a description.

*Example:* .imagen sunset over mountains
imagen.quota: ‚ùå API quota exceeded. Please try again later.

imagesearch.no_gifs: ‚ùå No GIFs found for your query.
imagesearch.no_api_key: ‚ùå Google Custom Search API key not configured.
imagesearch.no_images: ‚ùå No images found for your query.
imagesearch.invalid_api_key: ‚ùå Invalid API key or search engine ID.

music.desc: Search and download music from Spotify/YouTube
music.usage:
Please provide a song name or Spotify/YouTube link.

*Example:* .music Bohemian Rhapsody

news.desc: Get latest news or crypto/stock prices
news.title: üì∞ *Latest News*

notify.desc: Get notified when keywords are mentioned
notify.no_keywords: You are not watching any keywords.
notify.usage:
*Notify Commands:*

.notify add <keyword> - Watch a keyword
.notify remove <keyword> - Stop watching
.notify list - Show your keywords
.notify on/off - Enable/disable notifications
.notify clear - Remove all keywords

poll.desc: Create a poll in the chat
poll.title: Poll

quiz.desc: Play trivia quiz or number guessing game
quiz.question: Question
quiz.hint_info: Use .quiz hint for a hint ({0} hints left)
quiz.reply_to_answer: Reply to this message with your answer!
quiz.no_game: ‚ùå No active quiz. Use .quiz to start one!
quiz.usage:
*Quiz Commands:*

.quiz - Start trivia
.quiz hint - Get hint
.quiz stop - End quiz
.quiz guess - Number guessing game
quiz.guess_started:
üé≤ *Guess the Number!*

I'm thinking of a number between 1 and {0}.

You have {1} attempts. Good luck!
quiz.guess_correct:
üéâ *Correct!*

You guessed the number {0} in {1} attempts!

stats.title: üìä *Chat Statistics*
stats.usage:
*Stats Commands:*

.stats - View chat stats
.stats reset - Reset statistics (admin only)

sticker.reply_required: ‚ùå Please reply to a photo or video (max 10 seconds).

tag.desc: Tag all members in the group

task.usage:
*Task Commands:*

.task add <task> - Add new task
.task list - View all tasks
.task done <number> - Mark task as done
.task delete <number> - Delete a task
.task clear - Clear all tasks
.task reminder <minutes> <task> - Set reminder

translate.usage:
Usage: .translate <language code> <text>

Example: .translate es Hello world

viewonce.usage:
*View Once Management:*

.vv - Toggle in current chat
.setvv g - Forward to same group/chat
.setvv p - Forward to private chat
.setvv <jid> - Forward to specific JID
.setvv null - Disable
viewonce.not_set:
View-once forwarding not configured.

Use .setvv to configure.
viewonce.reply_required: ‚ùå Please reply to a view-once message.

voice.reply_audio: ‚ùå Please reply to an audio message.

common.not_admin: ‚ùå Bot must be admin to perform this action.
